plot: A squad of Maori troops in WWII Europe silently entertain themselves in a destroyed house while waiting to enter the coming battle.
title: Tama tu
plot_es: A squad of Maori troops in WWII Europe silently entertain themselves in a destroyed house while waiting to enter the coming battle.
